text: Tobin Bell (born Joseph Henry Tobin, Jr.; August 7, 1942) is an American character actor. He is best known for his role of John Kramer/Jigsaw of the Saw movie series. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Saw (franchise) Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Tobin Bell
